page.title: 06Stray dogs in Kirkcaldy
page.content: People who get a puppy for Christmas or their birthday love their little pet until it gets older when the owner gets bored having to take it walks and feed it. Then they just abandon their dog in the streets. The dog starts to cause trouble raking in buckets or even bites someone. That is why we now have 'Dog Patrols' going about picking up strays. In the last year there were 26 stray dogs picked up in the streets in Kirkcaldy. These dogs are being taken to kennels where people can come to see if their lost dog has been picked up. However some have to be put to sleep. The other problem is that some owners just put their dogs out to roam free and they leave a mess on the pavements or in gardens where children play.
